title: Low grade T213-2 Rucker Brooklyn Nat. moved to eBay
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: Low grade T213-2 Rucker Brooklyn Nat. moved to eBay
posts.post_content:
Hi, I upgraded my Rucker, Brooklyn Nat, so I have this one to sell.  I paid $31 for it a couple of years ago, so that is what I am asking, plus $2 shipping.

Any type of payment is fine.  Thanks much! Rick

Will also trade this card, along with some cash on my part, for any of the T213-2 cards on my want list.

[url]https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LjdPmdFDVTYd9ardcAkAyB3FmmXdmeS3QCxfhnzleiQ/edit#gid=878139990[/url]
